channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Large flytip, 31st October
item.description:
Reported previously - waste still in location. Assorted builders waste, bags, shower parts, fencing etc. Can this pls be cleared asap

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ivor Place, Marylebone, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping by entrance into Setchell Estate near Dunton Rd, 31st October
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hazel Way, Old Kent Road, London

item.title: Bollards and pavement damaged - Cambridge Avenue NW6, 31st October
item.description:
Cambridge Avenue NW6 - at junction with Alpha Place NW6 - bollards broken, damaged and missing following previous road traffic accident. Damage to pavement and bollards still haven't been repaired by Brent and this section of pavement and sharp exposed metal from damaged bollards remains hazardous and dangerous to pedestrians.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Cambridge Gardens, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped bin liners again!, 31st October
item.description:
Hello, I’m sorry to report that once again fly tippers have dumped full bin liners on the pavement outside our home. It seems to be about once a month now. Three full large bin liners. I cannot see what is in them but the last time they did this it’s was building materials. Many thanks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 81, Alleyn Road, Dulwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet
